Package comp3111.popnames

Class MostPopularNamesReport

extends java.lang.Object
Class MostPopularNamesReport is the class for Task One Report.

  • Constructor Details

    • MostPopularNamesReport

      public MostPopularNamesReport​(int year, int numberOfNames)
      Constructs a new MostPopularNamesReport.

      Parameters:
      year - year of interest
      numberOfNames - number of names to be reported

  • Method Details

    • checkInput

      public java.lang.String checkInput()
      Returns a string of alert text. In general, the function checkInput returns a empty string if the inputs are valid, returns the corresponding alert text if the input(s) is(are) invalid.

      Two inputs are checked:

      • year: whether it is within 1880 to 2019.
      • numberOfNames: whether it is bigger than 0, and smaller than the total birth in the year year.

      The function will be called by the function doMostPopularNamesReport in class Controller.

      Returns:
      a string of alert text.

    • genNameRecordList

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<NameRecord> genNameRecordList​(java.lang.String gender)
      Returns a observable list containing NameRecord to be reported. In general, the function genNameRecordList returns a top N most popular names of gender to be reported in the year of interest year, where the N is data member numberOfNames.

      The function will be called by the function doMostPopularNamesReport in class Controller.

      Parameters:
      gender - the target gender of the observable list.
      Returns:
      a observable list containing NameRecord to be reported.
      See Also:
      NameRecord

    • genSummary

      public java.lang.String genSummary​(java.lang.String gender, javafx.collections.ObservableList<NameRecord> olistData)
      Returns a string of summary report. In general, the function genSummary returns the summary of results of gender.

      The function will be called by the function doMostPopularNamesReport in class Controller.

      Parameters:
      gender - the target gender of the summary.
      olistData - the observable list containing NameRecord to be reported.
      Returns:
      a string of summary report.
      See Also:
      NameRecord

    • genDesciption

      public java.lang.String genDesciption​(java.lang.String gender)
      Returns a string of description for data table, bar chart and pie chart report of gender.

      The function will be called by the function doMostPopularNamesReport in class Controller.

      Parameters:
      gender - the target gender of the description.
      Returns:
      a string of description.

    • genDataTable

      public void genDataTable​(java.lang.String gender, javafx.collections.ObservableList<NameRecord> olistData, javafx.scene.control.TableView<NameRecord> tab1Table)
      Updates values in the data table. In general, the function genDataTable updates the tab1Table of gender by the olistData to be reported.

      There are three table columns:

      • Name: which refers to the data member name in class NameRecord.
      • Occurrences: which refers to the data member number in class NameRecord.
      • Percentage: which refers to the data member percentage in class NameRecord.

      The function will be called by the function doMostPopularNamesReport in class Controller.

      Parameters:
      gender - the target gender of the data table.
      olistData - the observable list containing NameRecord to be reported.
      tab1Table - the data table to be updated.
      See Also:
      NameRecord

    • genBarChart

      public void genBarChart​(java.lang.String gender, javafx.collections.ObservableList<NameRecord> olistData, javafx.scene.chart.BarChart<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> tab1Bar)
      Updates values in the bar chart. In general, the function genBarChart updates the tab1Bar of gender by the olistData to be reported.

      The function will be called by the function doMostPopularNamesReport in class Controller.

      Parameters:
      gender - the target gender of the data table.
      olistData - the observable list containing NameRecord to be reported.
      tab1Bar - the bar chart to be updated.
      See Also:
      NameRecord
